title: Traded: Cy Young Glove Shows SGC 70
author: bundy462

posts.post_title: Traded: Cy Young Glove Shows SGC 70
posts.post_content:
Card has been traded.

Higher grade than the rest of my collection, so I'd like to trade it. I'm interested in grade 2-4 Mathewson, Cy Young, Cobb, and WaJo cards. I do try to avoid heavy creasing unless it is a tougher back. Would also consider selling if anyone wants to make an offer. Thanks.
